description: '''John Arden''' "'''Jay'''" '''Ferguson''' (born May 10, 1947) is an American [[rock music|rock]] and [[pop music|pop]] musician known for his work with the bands [[Spirit (band)|Spirit]] and [[Jo Jo Gunne]], and his 1978 solo hit "[[Thunder Island (song)|Thunder Island]]". His later career has been as a composer of music for television programs and films, most notably the theme song for the American version of ''[[The Office (American TV series)|The Office]]'' on [[NBC]].
